mapper.insert: insert into gacha_activity_account_day (user_id,activity_id,day,day_count,day_count_surplus,create_time,update_time) values (#{userId}, #{activityId},#{day}, #{dayCount}, #{dayCountSurplus}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update gacha_activity_account_day set day_count_surplus = day_count_surplus -1, update_time = now() where activity_id=#{activityId} and user_id=#{userId} and day=#{day} and day_count_surplus>0
